Text:
Thank you very much TvTeam for all your wonderful uploadings that I enjoy very much !! Only thing some times I miss several episodes in AFG, like
episode 2 in that case...... 
Anyway,  thanks a lot for all !!
margot45

Might want to avoid TvTeam's Dancing on the Edge ep "4" uploads... Two have been confirmed as being ep 3. 

Don't know about this one, but odds are even that it's the wrong episode (unusual for TvT).
